text:
Berlin, Germany - EyeEm - Computer Vision Engineer or Intern - VISA

Do you want to do Image Retrieval on millions of photos? Join EyeEm as a Computer Vision Engineer or Intern.

Here are the official announcements:

Computer Vision Engineer https://eyeem.bamboohr.co.uk/jobs/view.php?id=25

Computer Vision Intern https://eyeem.bamboohr.co.uk/jobs/view.php?id=24

To find out more about how we roll visit https://www.eyeem.com/careers­ or contact me at ludwig at company domain.
